sys_atf_test.description: The Requested for field is set with a client script to be the user viewing the new record form Test generated from template. To complete this test do the following: 1. Create a user with specified roles and groups for impersonation. 2. Navigates to a module, as if a user had clicked on it 3. Validates field values on the current form.
sys_atf_test.name: Set [Requested for] field when creating a new record
sys_atf_test.sys_name: Set [Requested for] field when creating a new record
